text: @BorisJohnson For the love of god.....this from a man who referred to black people as 'piccaninnies' with 'watermelon smiles'!!! You couldn’t make this shit up🤬🤬🤬 After the COVID-19 pandemic is over the, the racism pandemic will still be here #BlackLivesMatter
